name: fusionPlusAPI
description: Access 1inch Fusion+ API for cross-chain swaps. This API provides advanced gasless swaps with MEV protection. CRITICAL: When users ask for cross-chain swaps or Fusion quotes, you MUST extract the parameters from their natural language. COMMON PATTERNS: 'Swap 0.1 ETH from Arbitrum to Ethereum mainnet using Fusion' → endpoint='getQuote', srcChain=42161 (Arbitrum), dstChain=1 (Ethereum), srcTokenAddress='0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' (ETH), dstTokenAddress='0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' (ETH), amount=100000000000000000 (0.1 ETH in wei), walletAddress='USER_WALLET_ADDRESS', enableEstimate=true. 'Get Fusion quote for 1000 USDC from Ethereum to Polygon' → endpoint='getQuote', srcChain=1 (Ethereum), dstChain=137 (Polygon), srcTokenAddress='0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' (USDC), dstTokenAddress='0x2791Bca1f2de4661ED88A30C99A7a9449Aa84174' (USDC on Polygon), amount=1000000 (1000 USDC in smallest units), walletAddress='USER_WALLET_ADDRESS', enableEstimate=true. TOKEN ADDRESSES: ETH='0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee', USDC='0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48', WETH='0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2', DAI='0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f'. CHAIN IDs: Ethereum=1, Polygon=137, Arbitrum=42161, Optimism=10, BSC=56. DECIMALS: ETH=18, USDC=6, DAI=18. EXAMPLES: Quote: {"endpoint": "getQuote", "srcChain": 42161, "dstChain": 1, "srcTokenAddress": "0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee", "dstTokenAddress": "0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee", "amount": 100000000000000000, "walletAddress": "0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b8D4C9db96C4b4d8b6", "enableEstimate": true}. Active Orders: {"endpoint": "getActiveOrders", "srcChain": 1, "dstChain": 137}. Escrow Factory: {"endpoint": "getEscrowFactory", "chainId": 1}.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The Fusion+ API endpoint to call. Use 'getActiveOrders' to get cross-chain swap active orders, 'getEscrowFactory' to get escrow factory contract address, 'getQuote' to get quote details for cross-chain swaps.

limit.description: Number of active orders to receive (default: 100, max: 500)

srcChain.description: Source chain ID (REQUIRED for getActiveOrders and getQuote). CHAIN IDs: Ethereum=1, Polygon=137, Arbitrum=42161, Optimism=10, BSC=56

dstChain.description: Destination chain ID (REQUIRED for getActiveOrders and getQuote). CHAIN IDs: Ethereum=1, Polygon=137, Arbitrum=42161, Optimism=10, BSC=56

chainId.description: Chain ID (REQUIRED for getEscrowFactory). CHAIN IDs: Ethereum=1, Polygon=137, Arbitrum=42161, Optimism=10, BSC=56

srcTokenAddress.description: Address of source token (REQUIRED for getQuote). COMMON TOKENS: ETH='0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee', USDC='0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48', WETH='0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2', DAI='0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f'

dstTokenAddress.description: Address of destination token (REQUIRED for getQuote). COMMON TOKENS: ETH='0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee', USDC='0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48', WETH='0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2', DAI='0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f'

amount.description: Amount to swap (REQUIRED for getQuote). CONVERT: 1 ETH = 1000000000000000000, 1 USDC = 1000000, 1 DAI = 1000000000000000000. For user amounts like '0.1 ETH', convert to 100000000000000000 (0.1 * 10^18)

walletAddress.description: Wallet address (REQUIRED for getQuote). Address of the wallet or contract who will create Fusion order

enableEstimate.description: Enable estimation (REQUIRED for getQuote). If enabled then get estimation from 1inch swap builder and generates quoteId

fee.description: Fee in bps format, 1% is equal to 100bps (optional for getQuote)

isPermit2.description: Permit2 allowance transfer encoded call (optional for getQuote)

permit.description: Permit, user approval sign (optional for getQuote)
